This was my final score for the Bleach Quiz App! Check me out :)
The anime Bleach features a main character with bright red hair.
The author of the Bleach manga series is named Tite Kubo.
Ichigo is the only one in his family with the ability to see spirits.
How does Ichigo\'s younger sister, Karin, find out that Ichigo is a Shinigami?
Ichigo witnissed his mother die in a car crash when he was a child.
Toshiro Hitsugaya is the only Bleach character with an ice-type zanpakto.
What kind of zanpakto does Rukia have?
How does Ichigo defeat Ulquiorra at the end of the Arrancar arc?
The primary military division in the Soul Society is split into 13 different squads, each with its own commanding captain.
Which one of Ichigo\'s friends is a Quincy?
Who is the captain of squad 10?
